title: Peterson reaction & Team of ATL debate
itunes:title: Peterson reaction & Team of ATL debate
description:
A room full of heroes -- Dan Hanzus, Gregg Rosenthal, Chris Wesseling and Marc Sessler -- react to the latest news including the Adrian Peterson and Greg Hardy situations. The guys also engage in a heated debate about the "Team of the ATL" and take a deeper look at Gregg's Week 2 "Winners and Losers" column.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
